name: Hard Science
description:
Hard Science is a short 2 level retro FPS. You are a bounty hunter contracted to infiltrate a fascist facility and assassinate the scientists whose work has aided in the subjugation of entire planets.

This game was made as a self-imposed challenge to turn an art pack into a retro FPS  The art pack used was: https://psychronic.itch.io/galacti-chrons-sci-fi-warehouse-tileset
